r.d: An interface for accessing Digg's web services API at http://services.digg.com.
r.n: * Added Services_Digg_Request to send requests to the API asynchronously in parallel. * Added classes to Services_Digg_Response_php for the launch of Digg Images . * Reworked exception handling of responses so that the last API call and raw API response are included in the exceptions thrown.
